text: The Gordon Sisters Boxing is a 1901THE GORDON SISTERS BOXINGJennifer Hargreaves, Eric Anderson. Routledge Handbook of Sport, Gender and Sexuality American silent movie. It stars Bessie Gordon and Minnie Gordon. ==Actors== * Bessie Gordon as Boxer In Black * Minnie Gordon as Boxer In White ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1901 movies Category:American silent movies Category:American sports movies Category:Boxing movies
title: The Gordon Sisters Boxing
